message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a small share, but I think I deserve more for my negotiating skills!
I'll give you a decent share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I'll give you a tiny bit, but you're getting close to the minimum!
I'm not going to settle for a tiny share, I'll give you a better deal this time!
You're getting desperate, take it or leave it!
I'm not desperate, I'll give you a very small share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
You're not getting any more, take it or I'll take it all!
I'll take it all, you're not getting a single penny more!
